extracted_playbook.title: Update to PowerSYSTEM Center 2020 Update 23
extracted_playbook.description: Update to the latest version of PowerSYSTEM Center 2020 to address vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is updating to PowerSYSTEM Center 2020 Update 23 possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Application Allow-Listing
extracted_playbook.description: Implement application allow-listing to prevent unauthorized executables from running.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable DEP and ASLR
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure Data Execution Prevention (DEP) and Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) are enabled within the operating system. Memory protection controls can be enabled via Windows Security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs), ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult CISA Resources
extracted_playbook.description: Consult CISA resources for additional mitigation guidance and recommended practices, including the ICS webpage and technical information papers.
